intituling.full-citation: VECTOR GAS LIMITED V BAY OF PLENTY ENERGY LIMITED SC 65/2008 10 February 2010
intituling.court: IN THE SUPREME COURT OF NEW ZEALAND
intituling.counsel: J E Hodder SC and K E Cornége for Appellant
H N McIntosh and K F M Wevers for Respondent
intituling.bench: Blanchard, Tipping, McGrath, Wilson and Gault JJ

entry.label: B
entry.text: The respondent is to pay to the appellant costs of $15,000 together with reasonable disbursements as fixed by the Registrar.

entry.label: C
entry.text: Costs in the lower Courts are to be fixed by those Courts in the light of this Court’s judgment.

para.text: [1] This appeal requires the Court to interpret a gas supply contract entered into in somewhat unusual circumstances.
